MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have manages to restore power to a number of properties, our engineers are still working to repair grounded overhead lines and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.15pm on Tuesday 23rd February 2021.
